Articles.Content:
Been playing with KSP now for the last couple of months, and have found this forum to be immensely helpful. Figured it was high time I actually registered so I can participate.

And for a first post, let me just give a warm and grateful THANK YOU!!! to what has to be the most awesome group of modders I've ever seen. Seriously, guys, your work on your various and wonderful creations has turned KSP as a platform into one of the most enjoyable gaming experiences I've had in a long, long time. Practically every day is like Christmas when I come on here and see what's just been added, improved, and updated. So again, thank you!
Hello and Welcome! Hopefully you'll have a good time here
